user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
  o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)
  o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
  o Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category; call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the newly created datafile.
  o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
  o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step (use crud pipeline).
  o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations on the DHEM model based on the user's input using the appropriate PLEXOS pipelines.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.'

function_args.user_input: Copy the H2\Gas file and set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Create a modified version of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999.'

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class under the Gas Pipeline category with a PCIPMI capacities Unlimited theme and add the filename property with the newly created datafile name.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category, call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.'

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the model using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities.'

tasks.description: For each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories under the gas pipeline class, add a max flow property associated with the newly created datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories.'

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename the new model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Clone the model DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995 and add the new scenario.'
